title: Verify: Test PostgreSQL Production Support
description:
Run automated tests for task T-044.
Review changes and verify acceptance criteria.
Original: Test the backend with PostgreSQL as the database. Identify and fix any compatibility or migration issues. Ensure all features work with PostgreSQL.
Criteria:
- Backend runs with PostgreSQL
- All migrations apply cleanly
- No database errors during normal operation
acceptance_criteria: No database errors during normal operation
